parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the door hinge can cause the door to fall off or become difficult to open and close, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The door hinge bolts are rusted
the door hinge is loose
the door falls off
the door is difficult to open or close
the door lowers when opened.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The rusting of the body and structural components can compromise the safety and integrity of the vehicle, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The metal frame that holds the windshield wiper motor is deteriorating
the pillar attached to the door hinge is disintegrating
the door has come apart from the sheet metal on the upper portion of the driver's side around the hinge area.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The defects in the convertible top can cause poor visibility, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The clarity of the windows on the convertible top has faded
resulting in poor visibility.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the fiberglass top can cause it to fall off while driving, which can lead to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The fiberglass top fell off while driving.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the cross members can compromise the structural integrity of the vehicle, leading to accidents or injuries.
symptoms: The cross members failed.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle housing welds can cause the rear of the vehicle to ride low, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially serious injuries.
symptoms: The right rear of the vehicle rides low
the rear axle housing welds appear stretched and leaking
the vehicle wanders or drifts on the road without driver control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the wheel bearings can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents and potentially serious injuries.
symptoms: The wheel bearings fail
the vehicle wanders or drifts on the road without driver control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the front strut can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents and potentially serious injuries.
symptoms: The front strut leaks
the vehicle wanders or drifts on the road without driver control.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear brakes can cause the vehicle to lose control, leading to accidents and potentially serious injuries.
symptoms: The rear brakes fail
the vehicle wanders or drifts on the road without driver control.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Torque Converter Solenoid and Fluid Pressure Switch Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the torque converter solenoid and fluid pressure switch can cause transmission problems, leading to reduced vehicle performance, decreased fuel efficiency, and potential safety risks.
symptoms: Transmission slipping
hesitation
or failure to engage gears
repeated replacement of parts every 15
000 miles.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the rear axle bearing can cause loss of vehicle control, leading to accidents, and can also result in costly repairs.
symptoms: Grinding or whining noise from the rear axle
vibration while driving
failure of the rear axle bearing.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the clutch cable can cause the clutch pedal to fail, making it difficult or impossible to shift gears, which can lead to accidents or leave the driver stranded.
symptoms: Clutch pedal feels soft or spongy
clutch pedal sticks to the floor
sudden breakage of the clutch cable
inability to shift gears.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Refusal of Recall Repairs on Axle Housing Tube
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The refusal of recall repairs on the axle housing tube can lead to continued safety risks, including the potential for axle failure, loss of vehicle control, and accidents.
symptoms: Cracked or damaged axle housing tube
refusal of dealership to perform recall repairs.
